title: Persona 5 the Animation: The Day Breakers
synopsis: There is a new urban legend circulating Tokyo. It claims that if you make a request in the Ask-a-Thief Channel, the Phantom Thieves of Hearts will show up and bring justice by stealing a corrupt person's heart and making them regret all their wrongdoings. As strange and inexplicable events continue to happen all around town, more people submit their requests in hope that the mysterious vigilante group will help.
characters: ['Amamiya, Ren', 'Sakamoto, Ryuuji', 'Kitagawa, Yuusuke', 'Takamaki, Ann', 'Morgana', 'Makigami, Kazuya', 'Akechi, Gorou', 'Makigami, Naoya']
voices: ['Fukuyama, Jun', 'Miyano, Mamoru', 'Sugita, Tomokazu', 'Mizuki, Nana', 'Ootani, Ikue', 'Oosaka, Ryouta', 'Hoshi, Souichirou', 'Saitou, Souma']
